ibis.cashmere.constellation

Class Kernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ibis.cashmere.constellation.Kernel

  • public class Kernel
extends java.lang.Object
    A Kernel represents an MCL kernel. From this kernel one can create more than one KernelLaunch instances with which the kernel can be launched.
